div.style: font-family: Raleway; font-size: 0px; color: white; text-transform: uppercase;

p.style: display: inline-block; padding: 0.8rem 1.2rem; font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: 3px; background-color: rgb(178, 235, 242);
display: inline-block; padding: 0.8rem 1.2rem; font-weight: 700; font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: 3px; background-color: rgb(0, 188, 212);
